channel.title: Comments on: Cleaning home directory and unsubscribe from mailing list …

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
BTW, also removing software that installed for personal interest from corporate-issued laptop, include:
- clisp, gnat, python, VC++ express - blackberry and symbian (E90) related software - those Chinese software
item.content:encoded:
BTW, also removing software that installed for personal interest from corporate-issued laptop, include:

– clisp, gnat, python, VC++ express
– blackberry and symbian (E90) related software
– those Chinese software
